# Xyme <img src="/public/XYME.png" width="50" >
Welcome to Xyme! Your personalized medication and supplementation tracker built for mobile.
<br />
<br />
<a href="https://fsa-xyme.herokuapp.com/" target="_blank">Try Xyme</a><br/>

## About Xyme
Have you or a loved one ever felt overwhelmed with the amount of medications you need to take on a regular basis? Maybe unsure about any potential interactions the various medications you take may have with each other? Wish you had a consolidated place to keep track and send you reminders?

Look no further than Xyme! Xyme is a mobile-friendly web app built to help people keep track of their medications and help them stay organized. Check out our list of features below!

## Features

* Mobile-friendly interface
* Account/profile creation
* Personalized wallet to display your medications
* Add medications to your wallet by taking a picture of your medication label with image scanning via Google Cloud Vision (or manually via text input)
* Singular view of each medication in your wallet, including a basic description of the medication
* Interactions view to summarize potential interactions between the medications in your wallet
* Medication tracker to keep track of which medications you need to take for the day, and mark them off as you take them
* SMS notifications to remind you to take your medication in the morning or night with custom time settings
* Password reset via email
* Light/Dark mode

## The Engineers

Xyme was created by Sala Yoshida, Jordan Laguio, CJ Fung, and Zack Ward as part of their senior capstone for Fullstack Academy, completed in just 2 weeks!
